posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new postbash1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run serverbash1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static filesbash1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sitesbash1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
